subject: Re: Cherry picking changed for 3.0.25-final
body:
"Gerald (Jerry) Carter"  writes:

> The 3.0.25rc2 release is the final tarball which will be
> a complete copy of SAMBA_3_0_25.  I'll be cherry picking
> only the critical releases for the 3.0.25-final.
>
> We'll see how things go this week at SambaXP with regards
> to getting 3.0.25 released.
>

Jerry, apparently there's some significant problem with libsmbclient linking
that some people are seeing.  I will work on it upon my return home in the
middle of the week.  I have only spurious network connectivity right now, and
can't easily look at what's going on until I'm home.

Derrell
